channel.title: Want to make your server popular?
channel.description:
:)
Well i have found a solution for you all people who are desperate to invite lot of ppl and make ur server [glow=red,2,300]popular[/glow].
I can make you a nice forum so people can see if the server is online or chat about the server in the forum.
I have made a number of forums and so am an admin in many servers like
[glow=red,2,300]Hitsmenscape Welshscape Ogscape Pixelscape Snsscape[/glow]
Example:-
[url=http://www.hitsmenscape.co.nr]www.hitsmenscape.co.nr[/url]
Visit there and do a quick register and see how i have made the forum. See if you like the skins and the superb background. I am sure you'll like it.
If you want to make ur server popular conatact me by pm me in the forums or talking to me (nn) in any server which i am online or just simply reply me here.
All I ask you is an adminship place because I work hard to make server popular. But i like helping servers more than being active at servers.
Thankyou ;D
Please reply kindly
